resources.string: Located at km1 avenue cheikh Anta Diop, the ISI computer science institute, is under the supervision of the Ministry of Private Higher Education which is a signatory of all the diplomas issued, under the control of the ANAQ- Sup. ISI has been contributing for more than 27 years to the training of young African executives. With the ambition of the CEO, to participate in the diversification of the training offer in Senegal and in the sub-region, the ISI has been able to develop over the years, thus counting within it 09 campuses, or rub shoulders with more than thirty nationalities, which constitute the beautiful Isienne family. The group has experts of very high university level and specialists in several fields of IT and management. Thanks to its expertise and the quality of its services, the ISI Group delivers Bachelor and Master degrees recognized both by the business world and by the national "ANAQ SUP" and pan-African "CAMES" accreditation bodies. ". With a diversified training offer in the professions of the future, a permanent innovation of its programs, and the brilliant results obtained in the various exams and competitions, The Higher Institute of Informatics "ISI" is a leader in its field at Senegal and in the sub-region.
